input.original_text: Thankful for the prayers, I need more of those. Put my hands together bow my head and thank the Lord for everything he's done
input.translated_text: 感谢祈祷,我需要更多的祈祷.把我的手放在一起,鞠躬头,感谢主为他所做的一切.
